item.title: Hiring A YouTube Video Editor ($400+ Per Month) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are hiring an editor for our YouTube Channel. This job will require you to do the following:

Create Engaging Content Based Off The Script & Voice Over We Will Provide

Create 2-3 Videos Per Week

Be Able To Replicate The Quality Of Content As The Examples Below

Please check out some of the videos on these channels to verify you can match the quality of the content we are looking for before applying for this job.

https://youtu.be/-MyC5DfwQjs?si=u33nzSkxz8DDl-4y

https://youtu.be/hd37gXBPaRo?si=CEYS_LlK-6cM785m

We are paying $50+ per video for this job, so we are looking for a well-seasoned editor who has experience with making these styles of videos. We are looking to hire someone who can make consistent videos per month for our channel. if you have read through this entire job post please begin your cover letter with the word "blue". All other applicants will be excluded. Please do not apply if you are not happy with the FEE!

Budget: $50

item.title: YouTube Shorts Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a talented video editor to edit 5 YouTube Shorts videos per week on an ongoing basis. Each video is 60 seconds or less and will require creative editing to make them engaging and visually appealing.

The editor will be responsible for adding relevant music, captions, transitions, and ensuring the final videos are of high quality.

The ideal candidate must have experience in video editing software and a good understanding of YouTube Shorts format. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work within tight deadlines are essential for this role. Videos will be provided on a Friday and should be ready for scheduling on Sunday evening.

Your bid should be for all 5 videos.


Posted On: June 30, 2024 16:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: WANTED: Video-Editor for Social Media & Graphics Design - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, please read the job description carefully. I'm looking for a very talented person who can do the following:
- create shorts such as https://www.instagram.com/reel/C76Q1TgxFU1/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==
- edit longer-form videos for youtube that are visually clear to understand (example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tMlpDXwYi6U&ab_channel=JasonandLauren)
- create static instagram posts through batch-creation (Canva has a feature for that) by using a template and entering different texts that you'll receive from me (result example: https://www.instagram.com/p/C7dZtXehI8b/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==)
- create thumbnails such as in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K6CTQOifgSE (look at the thumbnail, not video)

What you will get from me:
- raw video footage to edit into long and short form videos: the videos will not be perfect. they will contain words like "well,..." "so..." or scenes that are re-recorded. your job is to create videos that look and sound great in the end. (Example: not cutting out filler words or long pauses will not lead to a great result)
- therefore your command of English listening and understanding of words has to be very good
- you will also get a brand guide and you have to follow that brand guide for all videos
- for the static posts created in canva you will get texts from me
- final deliverables should be: youtube wide format video, vertical format for shorts/reels/stories/tiktok, static images.

if you can also post content for me to all channels by writing concise and attention grabbing headlines and descriptions as well as relevant hashtags then let me know.

If you have the necessary skills and are interested, please do the following:
- start your application with the word "yabbadabbadoo". any application without this as the first word will be ignored.
- send me samples of your work
- send me an offer for how much you charge and which of the tasks mentioned you can cover

thank you


Posted On: June 30, 2024 16:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Social Media Video, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Canva
Skills: YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Social Media Video, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Canva
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.description:
Video Editor | LONG TERM | podcast- celebrities | Youtube Agency
Take a look at this video, note the editing details throughout.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hZpDQKmsDys

Are you able to edit a video like this?

The goal is to edit 4 weekly videos of 30 minutes each, at least.
The price per edited minute is $1. Weekly Total 120$. Monthly equals 480$.
The editing of each video must be ready in 2 days.

We´re looking for someone with the following requirements

1º Fast response times
2º Good understanding of storytelling and youtube retention.
3º No use of stock content.

***[IMPORTANT] Your offer WON'T be read if you do not attach previous video editing work.

If you feel confident to do this style of editing, send me a message to start today.

item.title: Thumbnail artist/creator for Business Niche Youtube videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are an up and coming Business YouTube channel, talking about different brands and companies, and we are looking for a SKILLED thumbnail creator! You MUST have prior experience creating business YT channel thumbnails. If not, you won’t be considered, unfortunately.

Below are examples of the types of thumbnails I'm looking for:
https://www.youtube.com/@Dollar.Stories
https://www.youtube.com/@MBA-Maven

Here's just some of the criteria that this person would meet:

- STRONG skills in Photoshop and other photo editing software

-has created business thumbnails for other YouTube channels

- Has their own computer and highspeed Internet connection.

- Speaks, reads, and writes good English.

Please note that if hired, you could have the incredible opportunity to work on not just one, but many more videos and projects in the future! Do look at this as a long-term opportunity and you will be rewarded accordingly!

Please also include links to as many examples of your work with details behind it.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 30, 2024 15:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Mission Style, CorelDRAW, Art Deco, Contemporary Style, Graffiti, Minimalist, Organic & Natural Style

item.title: Easter Egg Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
**Description:**
We are on the lookout for a highly talented video editing team capable of creating engaging and intricate Easter egg videos. Our goal is to produce content that captivates and entertains our audience, encouraging them to discover hidden details and surprises throughout the video.

**Responsibilities:**
- Collaborate with our creative team to understand the vision and requirements for each video.
- Edit raw footage into a cohesive and engaging final product.
- Incorporate Easter eggs seamlessly into the video, ensuring they are both challenging and rewarding for viewers to discover.
- Enhance videos with high-quality graphics, sound effects, and music to elevate the overall viewing experience.
- Ensure all videos meet our brand standards and are delivered on time.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience in video editing, with a strong portfolio showcasing previous work on Easter egg videos or similar content.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Ability to create high-quality graphics and animations.
- Strong attention to detail and creativity.
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
- Ability to work within tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience with creating viral content on platforms like YouTube.
- Understanding of storytelling and pacing in video production.
- Familiarity with current trends and techniques in video editing and content creation.

**Example of Desired Work:**
Please refer to the following video for an example of the type and quality of content we are aiming to produce: [Easter Egg Video Example](https://youtu.be/Gf75yK82r0k?si=SFg6T8cdyHOounDU)

**How to Apply:**
If you believe you have the skills and creativity to bring our vision to life, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your portfolio, along with a brief description of your approach to video editing and any relevant experience with Easter egg videos.

We look forward to collaborating with a team that shares our passion for creating captivating and fun content!

---



Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 15:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor / Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Video Editor for Sports Content

Position: Video Editor  
Industry: Baseball  
Commitment: 5-8 videos per week

Job Overview:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor with a strong command of English and a passion for sports to edit both short-form reels and long-form videos. The ideal candidate will have experience in the sports industry and a proven ability to produce high-quality, engaging video content.

Responsibilities:
- Edit and produce 5-8 videos per week, including short-form reels and long-form videos.
- Ensure all content is engaging, dynamic, and consistent with our brand's voice and style.
- Collaborate with our team to understand the vision and goals for each video.
- Integrate feedback to refine and improve video content.
- Manage and organize video files and assets.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing, particularly within the sports industry.
- Strong command of English, with excellent communication skills.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail.
- Flexible working hours to accommodate the production schedule.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience creating viral content for social media platforms (e.g., Instagram, YouTube, TikTok).
- Understanding of current trends in sports media and content creation.
- Ability to work with a variety of video formats and styles.


**Note**: Only candidates with a portfolio of previous work in video editing will be considered for this role.



Hourly Range: $3.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 15:17 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Sports & Recreation, Instagram, Twitter/X, YouTube, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Sports & Recreation, Instagram, Twitter/X, YouTube, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Channel Manager for Movie Recap Channel (Sinhala Language) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled YouTube Channel Manager to join our team and help manage our movie recap channel in the Sinhala language. As the Channel Manager, you will be responsible for assisting us in selecting appealing and eye-catching movie thumbnail ideas. You should be passionate about movies, have a strong understanding of the Sinhala language, and be familiar with the movie recap niche. This role requires creativity, attention to detail, and an ability to engage our target audience through visually compelling thumbnails. If you have a proven track record in managing YouTube channels and are excited to contribute to our growing community, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- YouTube channel management
- Sinhala language proficiency
- Creative thinking
- Knowledge of the movie recap niche

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 30, 2024 15:17 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Audit, Content Creation, Content Management, Content Strategy, Market Research, Content Planning, Content Guidelines, Video Editing, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube, Content Writing, Social Media Marketing
